roleset.name: play golf with club and golf ball, playing golf

example.text: The Ming emperor Xuanzong, golfing in full regal splendor is ...

example.name: Arg0
example.text: His golfing has really started to impact his fashion sense.

example.name: arg0
example.text: Most of his golf was played in Queensland while he was home, and it included a trip with his parents to Barnbougle in Tasmania.

roleset.note: GOLF-V NOTES: Created by Jena (from golf.01-v)
GOLF-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on WN, golf-v.01. No VNcls. (from golf.01-n)
